reviewText:
I love this show and fantasize about having a treehouse like the kind they build. However, I am not purchasing this DVD since it is my hope that all seasons will eventually be released as a Blu-ray box set. Also, it would be wonderful if they added additional scenes not shown when the episodes aired.

Waiting and Hoping!

Treehouse Masters is one of my favorite shows on TV and to my delight it is becoming a favorite of my whole family from my 70 year old husband to our 5 year old grandson. Pete Nelson is so full of enthusiasm for people and fulfilling their dreams. His crew are great to watch as they create the masterpieces that Pete designs. We love season one of this marvelous show and can't wait til all four seasons are available on DVD.
I love this series, and I love Pete Nelson, his crew, and the tree houses! The series makes me long for a treehouse of my own!

This program is the best! Pete Nelson is a great host. He is so positive, funny and loves to build tree houses! The combination of his personality and nature makes all his programs so enjoyable to watch!
(`'.(`'.(`'.* Super Seller * Great Product * Thank You!! * .'').'').'')
I BOUGHT THIS AS A GIFT.

Not only is it great to see the amazing treehouses they build, but Pete Nelson and crew have such great personalities.  It's fun to watch their interactions and see how much they enjoy the work they do.  We should all be so lucky.  Great show!  I hope all the Seasons will be on DVD eventually.
